description: Wearing a ball cap, blue work pants, a greasy wife beater and coming right from his job as a mechanic, the only thing that could have made Julian any straighter would have been if he walked in the door with his girlfriend.There was something extremely seductive about those very serious eyes that still have a hint of a boyish twinkle. But when he ripped off that shirt and revealed a chest that was covered in fur but still so lean you could see his abs under the dark swirls, there was nothing boyish about that .That was 100% man and then some.Inside that family sized tent in his boxers was a deep dark dense jungle on top of eight and one half inches of thick uncut pinga. You know we didn't let him leave until he gave us demonstration of his own unique technique for giving a lube job and from the way he soaked that towel, he's got enough for whole car pool!
title: Julian The Movie
